price: 93. Nabii Yuusuf isi abbah xaagu keenik abe waqdi, weeqi gibdah inti weem kaah warseeniih, ama yi kamis luk gexaay yabbak foocal hayisa mabla kaah aduureleeh yable num akkelek, sinni buxaaxih тага inkih yol baaha keenik iyye.
arabic: ٱذۡهَبُواْ بِقَمِيصِي هَٰذَا فَأَلۡقُوهُ عَلَىٰ وَجۡهِ أَبِي يَأۡتِ بَصِيرٗا وَأۡتُونِي بِأَهۡلِكُمۡ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: idh'habū biqamīṣī hādhā fa-alqūhu ʿalā wajhi abī yati baṣīran watūnī bi-ahlikum ajmaʿīna
